build.buildCommand:
apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3-pip && ls -la && ls -la website/ && ls -la website/backend/ && mkdir -p website/backend && cp *.py website/backend/ && cp *.csv website/backend/ && cd website/backend && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; else echo 'fastapi==0.104.1
uvicorn==0.24.0
pandas==2.1.1
numpy==1.26.1
scikit-learn==1.3.2
python-multipart==0.0.6
pydantic==2.4.2
scipy==1.11.3
matplotlib==3.8.1
seaborn==0.13.0' > requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements.txt; fi

deploy.startCommand: cd website/backend && python3 -c "import os; print('Current directory:', os.getcwd()); print('Directory contents:', os.listdir('.'))" && python3 -m uvicorn app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT
